name: Conditional order refused (clarification) (joint and sole)
body:
Case number: ((reference number))

Dear ((first name)) ((last name)),

Your application for a conditional order has been reviewed. You need to provide some more information before it can progress. 

((husbandJoint??Either you or your husband can provide the information.))((wifeJoint??Either you or your wife can provide the information.))((civilPartnerJoint??Either you or your civil partner can provide the information.))((joint conditional order?? You should agree your response first. They have also been sent this email.))

Sign into your HMCTS account to see the reason and what you need to do: ((signin url))


Divorce and Dissolution 
HM Courts & Tribunals Service 
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm) 

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email.
subject: Action required: your application ((isDivorce??for divorce))((isDissolution??to end your civil partnership))
